resources.string: Sway
cmsc436.umd.edu.measurement_service_handler

Hello, and again, welcome to the Aperture Science Enrichment Center. We are currently experiencing technical difficulties due to circumstances of potentially apocalyptic significance beyond our control. However, thanks to Emergency Testing Protocols, testing can continue. These pre-recorded messages will provide instructional and motivational support, so that science can still be done, even in the event of environmental, social, economic, or structural collapse. . . For the first exam please stand with your legs spread. . . . stand still. . . The portal will open and emergency testing will begin in three. Two. One.
Hello, This is the First Test of the Balance Tests. In this test I will need you to spread you legs to your shoulder width,. \n to start the test double tap with two fingers on the screen, or say go

Hello, this is the second of the Balance Tests. In this test I will need you keep your legs closed, so that they are touching each other, and keep your eyes open ,. \n to start the test double tap with two fingers on the screen, or say go

Hello, this is the third of the Balance Tests. In this test I will need you keep your legs closed, so that they are touching each other, keep your eyes closed ,. \n to start the test double tap with two fingers on the screen, or say go
Hello, this is the practice Balance Tests. Please Stand However you would like.\n double tap with two fingers on the screen to start the test
Now We can start the test in five. . . . four. . . . three. . . . two. . . . one
Dummy Button
DUMMY\nCONTENT

Welcome to the user instruction guide for the Sway Test. The Sway Test will consist of three different tests. Swipe left to view the instructions for each (specific) test. After viewing the instructions, the app will switch to Practice mode. Practice mode will allow you to practice the Sway Test as long as you want before exiting.
Instructions
\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t \n\t Please swipe through the instructions for \teach test
\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t \n\t TEST 1\n\t Please have legs opened and aligned with your shoulders

TEST 2 

 Please have your legs closed 
and eyes opened
\t\t\t\t\tTEST 3 \n\n Please have your legs closed and eyes closed
\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t \n\t TEST 1\n\t Please have legs opened and aligned with your shoulders

TEST 2 

 Please have your legs closed 
and eyes opened
\t\t\t\t\tTEST 3 \n\n Please have your legs closed and eyes closed
Instructions: You need to have eyes closed and\n legs opened

string-array.name: test_instr_text_1
string-array.item: Please stand with your legs opened and aligned with your shoulders. Keep your eyes opened.

string-array.name: test_instr_text_2
string-array.item: Please stand with your legs closed and your eyes opened.

string-array.name: test_instr_text_3
string-array.item: Please stand with your legs closed and your eyes closed.

string-array.name: practice_text
string-array.item: Click the \"Start\" button to start Practice Mode. Practice mode will allow you to practice the Sway Test as long as you wish to before exiting.
